amendment.description: Amendment makes adjustments to strengthen the financial literacy provisions of the State Innovation Completion Grants, Innovation in College Access and Completion National Activities and contracting requirements related to private student loan servicers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 111-256 to make five minor language adjustments to strengthen the financial literacy provisions of the State Innovation Completion Grants, Innovation in College Access and Completion National Activities, and contracting requirements related to private student loan servicers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 2 (Roll no. 713).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 2 (Roll no. 713).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Himes.
